text: Poranthalum Ambalaiya Porakka Koodathu () is a 1993 Indian Tamil-language comedy film written, directed and filmed by N. K. Vishwanathan. The film stars Pandiarajan and Aishwarya in the lead roles. == Cast == * Pandiarajan * R. Sundarrajan * Venniradai Moorthy * Vinu Chakravarthy * Aishwarya * Srividya * Kovai Sarala * K. R. Savithri * MLA Thangaraj == Production == Poranthalum Ambalaiya Porakka Koodathu was directed by N. K. Vishwanathan who also wrote the screenplay and worked as cinematographer. The film was produced by T. S. Sethuraman and T. S. Saravanan under Kalyan Cine Productions. V. Udhayasankaran was the editor. == Soundtrack == The soundtrack was composed by Bala Bharathi. Lyrics written by Pulamaipithan, Muthulingham and Kalidasan. == Release and reception == Poranthalum Ambalaiya Porakka Koodathu was released on 25 September 1993. Malini Mannath of The Indian Express called it a "crass film" but lauded Vishwanathan's cinematography. == References == Category:Indian films Category:Indian comedy films Category:1990s Tamil- language films Category:Films directed by N. K. Vishwanathan Category:1993 comedy films
title: Poranthalum Ambalaiya Porakka Koodathu
